Third-Party Service Providers

Example Corp partners with the following trusted third-party providers to deliver our services:

Infrastructure & Operations

  • Cloudflare (CDN and DDoS Protection)
  • SendGrid (Email Delivery Service)
  • Datadog (Infrastructure Monitoring and Analytics)

Customer Support

  • Zendesk (Customer Support Ticketing)
  • Intercom (Customer Messaging Platform)

Analytics

  • Mixpanel (Product Analytics)
  • Amplitude (Behavioral Analytics)

Questions about our subprocessors? Contact us at privacy@example.com
